results.title: Inhibition of rat brain prostaglandin D synthase by 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitors.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@Lovastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, which reportedly cause @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Initiation_and_Maintenance_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007319 @@@insomnia@@@ in vivo, inhibited the PGD synthase activity dose-dependently and showed an IC50 value of 100 and 75 microM, respectively.

citations.NLM: Islam F, Watanabe Y, Hayaishi O. Inhibition of rat brain prostaglandin D synthase by 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitors. Biochem Int. 1990 Nov;22(4):601-5. PMID: 2127671
citations.BibTeX: @article{2127671, title={Inhibition of rat brain prostaglandin D synthase by 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase inhibitors.}, author={Islam F and Watanabe Y and Hayaishi O}, journal={Biochem Int}, volume={22}, number={4}, pages={601-5}}
